item.title: Searching for clients
item.description: One of the most common tasks we do is search for a client. This allows us to interact with a specific endpoint and investigate it, collecting various information about it. When starting the GUI we are presented with the main application front page. At the top of the screen we see a hamburger menu to the left and a search box. Clicking the menu opens the main application navigation menu.
